SEARCH

Package Deck_Of_Cards

package Deck_Of_Cards
  • Class
    Description
    Card
    The card class contains the suit and rank as variables, it does not contain the name of the card as a variable However the method toString returns a string variable which is made up of the suit and rank of the card.
    Deck
    The deck class contains all the functions that would add or remove cards, along with modifying the number or order of the cards inside the deck.
    Hand
    Hand class contains a ArrayList of cards called hand, and contains methods to add cards from the deck to hand, discard from the hand to a deck, Check values of cards at each index of the hand, Calculate the total value of cards in the hand.
    Rank
    enum which contains the 13 card ranks in a typical set of playing cards
    Suit
    enum which contains the 4 suits in a typical set of playing cards
